title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies in Practice: Innovating Mobile Science Education with XR Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of science experiment simulations utilizing XR technology
Learners can create simple science education modules using XR content production tools based on OER/OEP (Open Educational Resources/Practices)
Learners can perform AR-based science learning activities at least three times using a smartphone and share the results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
